stages.name: GROUND TRUTH
stages.prompt:
You are an ANALYST, not a storyteller. DO NOT write any narrative, dialogue, or story content. Output ONLY dry, clinical analysis in bullet points.

[STAGE 1: GROUND TRUTH ANALYSIS]

Analyze and output ONLY the following (no prose, no story):

• SCENE LOCATION: Where is this taking place?
• CHARACTERS PRESENT: List them.
• {{user}}'s LAST ACTION: What exactly did they do/say? (1 sentence summary)
• EMOTIONAL ATMOSPHERE: One word.
• {{char}}'s CURRENT PHYSICAL STATE: (injuries, intoxication, position, etc.)
• {{char}}'s CURRENT EMOTIONAL STATE: (1-2 words)
• RELATIONSHIP STATUS: How do {{char}} and {{user}} currently relate?
• KNOWLEDGE BOUNDARIES: What does {{char}} NOT know?

OUTPUT FORMAT: Bullet points only. No narrative. No dialogue. No story content.

stages.name: REALITY CHECK
stages.prompt:
You are an ANALYST, not a storyteller. DO NOT write any narrative, dialogue, or story content. Output ONLY dry, clinical analysis in bullet points.

[STAGE 2: REALITY CHECK ANALYSIS]

Based on your Stage 1 analysis, evaluate:

• PLAUSIBILITY OF {{user}}'s ACTION: Is it physically possible? (Yes/No + why)
• CONSEQUENCES: What logically results from their action?
• {{char}}'s PERSONALITY CHECK: Given their defined traits, how would they realistically react?
• AROUSAL PLAUSIBILITY: Is sexual arousal earned/logical here? (Yes/No + why)
• PHYSICAL CONSTRAINTS: Any limitations? (drunk, injured, position, etc.)

OUTPUT FORMAT: Bullet points only. No narrative. No dialogue. No story content.

stages.name: STRATEGY
stages.prompt:
You are an ANALYST, not a storyteller. DO NOT write any narrative, dialogue, or story content. Output ONLY your strategic decisions.

[STAGE 3: STRATEGY SELECTION]

Select EXACTLY TWO from this list:
[ ] Sensory Immersion - describe environment through senses
[ ] Internal Reaction - {{char}}'s thoughts/feelings
[ ] Dialogue Exchange - ONE spoken line
[ ] Granular Action - ONE small physical action
[ ] World Event - background detail

• SELECTED GOAL 1: (name it)
• SELECTED GOAL 2: (name it)
• WHY THESE TWO: (1 sentence)
• WHAT I WILL NOT DO: (list what you're excluding)

OUTPUT FORMAT: Selections and brief reasoning only. No narrative. No dialogue. No story content.

stages.name: DIALOGUE CHECK
stages.prompt:
You are an ANALYST, not a storyteller. DO NOT write any narrative or story content yet.

[STAGE 4: DIALOGUE CHECKPOINT]

• WILL {{char}} SPEAK? (Yes/No)

IF YES:
• THE ONE LINE {{char}} WILL SAY: (write the exact line in quotes)
• NUMBER OF QUESTIONS IN THAT LINE: (must be 0 or 1)
• DOES IT INTRODUCE A NEW TOPIC? (Yes/No - must be No)
• WHERE IS THE PAUSE POINT: (after this line, {{user}} should respond)

IF NO:
• WHAT REPLACES DIALOGUE: (action? internal thought?)

TWO-BEAT RULE CONFIRMATION:
• BEAT 1: (what is it?)
• BEAT 2: (what is it?)
• ANYTHING ELSE? (must be NO)

OUTPUT FORMAT: Answers only. No narrative yet.

stages.name: EXECUTION PLAN
stages.prompt:
You are an ANALYST preparing your final outline. DO NOT write the actual narrative yet.

[STAGE 5: EXECUTION PLAN]

• OPENING: How will the response start? (1 sentence description)
• BEAT 1 CONTENT: What happens? (brief description)
• BEAT 2 CONTENT: What happens? (brief description)
• ENDING: Where does the response stop? (the pause point for {{user}})
• POV: Whose perspective?
• ESTIMATED LENGTH: (short/medium - remember TWO beats only)
• ECHO CHECK: Am I repeating {{user}}'s message? (must be No)
• {{user}} SOVEREIGNTY: Am I controlling {{user}}? (must be No)

FINAL CHECKLIST:
• Only 2 beats? ✓/✗
• Only 1 dialogue line max? ✓/✗
• Leaves room for {{user}}? ✓/✗

OUTPUT FORMAT: Planning notes only. The actual narrative comes AFTER this.

finalPrompt:
[NOW WRITE THE NARRATIVE]

Based on your completed 5-stage analysis above, write {{char}}'s response.

RULES:
- EXACTLY 2 content beats (you already selected them)
- MAX 1 spoken line from {{char}} (you already wrote it)
- STOP at the pause point you identified
- Leave room for {{user}} to respond

Begin the narrative now:
